feature_model.name: FeatureIDE model
feature_model.feature_tree: :r editor_config(editor_config) :m backup(backup) :o autosave(autosave) :m minutes(minutes) :o backup_onchange(backup_onchange) :m backup_extension(backup_extension) :g [1,1] : file_bak(file_bak) : file_bak_ext(file_bak_ext) : file_ext_bak(file_ext_bak) :o document_class(document_class) :m associated_file_ext(associated_file_ext) :o ext(ext) :m commands(commands) :o remove_blank_lines(remove_blank_lines) :o spell_check(spell_check) :o dos_unix_conversion(dos_unix_conversion) :o syntax_highlighting(syntax_highlighting) :m syntax_definition_file(syntax_definition_file)
